This document discusses mobile marketing tactics and provides examples. It begins by discussing the growing mobile marketing landscape and spending on mobile ads. It then discusses how mobile ad spending does not yet match consumer usage of mobile devices. Several tactics for mobile marketing are presented, including engaging with video ads, driving brand awareness with image and text-based ads, and increasing sales through rich interactive ad experiences. Case studies are provided for each tactic.

11. Engaging moms through in-ad video Initial mobile ad Objective Create awareness of the Joy program Rich in-ad video experience and Facebook contests Consumer insight 56% of BabyCenter Moms have smartphones, 1 in 10 have clicked on a mobile ad Solution Leverage a targeted rich media mobile ad to deliver engagement through video and email Result Enormous brand exposure, topping out at 235MM+ mobile impressions and deep engagement – CTR was over 10% Index © BabyCenter, LLC. Confidential. All rights reserved.

12. Driving brand awareness – no offer necessary Initial mobile ad Objective Extend the Old Navy campaign across Now expanded, high-impact mobile ad multiple screens – from online to mobile Consumer insight 42% of smartphone owning moms use their device to shop Solution Leverage a targeted rich media mobile ad that pulls in copy and imagery from onsite advertising Result Moms tapped the Old Navy mobile ad to visit the dot com site 2x more than the BabyCenter onsite average Index © BabyCenter, LLC. Confidential. All rights reserved.

13. Featuring video formats beyond pre-roll Expanded, video enabled mobile ad Objective Increase awareness and drive excitement for the new Disney Junior TV show Text reminder Consumer insight BabyCenter Moms are mobile power users – turning 34 pages per visit Solution Feature sneak peeks of the new TV show and invite moms to set a text reminder to watch Result Drove incremental viewership of sneak peek previews Index © BabyCenter, LLC. Confidential. All rights reserved.

14. Driving sales through a rich, in-ad user experience Initial ad on BabyCenter Objective Rich, expanded consumer Reach Mom anytime, anywhere in-ad experience with compelling offers Consumer insight Nearly half of all mobile moms take action after seeing an ad on their smartphone Solution Leverage the power of BabyCenter mobile rich media to let moms shop their way – buy it now or get the promo via email to shop later Result Mom engagement out-performed static mobile ads and surpassed the 7% mobile rich media industry average Index © BabyCenter, LLC. Confidential. All rights reserved.

15. Engaging buyers through creative, interactive mobile rich media Initial mobile ad on BabyCenter Objective Activate mobile moms with a simple, engagement rich media unit to drive Build a sales Boppy Consumer insight Nearly half of all mobile moms take an action after seeing an ad on their smartphone Solution BabyCenter designed an interactive “Build a Boppy” mobile rich media unit with “Buy Now” and email functionality Result Unique solution differentiates the Boppy brand and drives sales Index © BabyCenter, LLC. Confidential. All rights reserved.
